instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2879b backlight sometimes light up, sometimes dark
threads.message: came in with burn lcd connector, replaced, but pin 18 lvds connector is gone,( LVDS_CONN_A_CLK_F_P ), is this pin necessary ? because its a bit difficult to jumper wire to behind board..

threads.title: 820-2879b backlight sometimes light up, sometimes dark
threads.message:
You must rebuild all traces there.
Use tiny magnet wire (i.e. 0.03mm)...

threads.title: 820-2879b backlight sometimes light up, sometimes dark
threads.message:
I directly jump the pin to the back of the macbook, backlight work now, thanks..
by the way, I bought medusa 3, already requested manual from them but still no reply, maybe you have it ?

threads.title: 820-2879b backlight sometimes light up, sometimes dark
threads.message: You should have a download link in the messages, or in the papers of the package.
